entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Investigate failures in WorkloadTests when using net10.0 workload manifests #45516
    10.0.1xx
  • Unable to build Solution that contains multi-targeted projects and using ArtifactsPath with IncludeProjectNameInArtifactsPaths set to false #45513
    Discussion
  • Poorly formatted launchSettings.json and dotnet watch goes into production #45509
  • [NETE2ESDK] [Azure Linux ARM64] Installing .NET 10 alpha SDK in Mariner2 ARM64 2.0 or Azure Linux ARM64 3.0 should not depend on package netstandard-targeting-pack-2.1 #45499

Closed

  • dotnet tool CLI command fails when nuget.config includes a private package source #45235
  • Self-contained single-file program, published with --no-build option, needs .NET to be installed #45230
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.4xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #44678
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.3xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #44668
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.1xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #44674
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/9.0.1xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #44443
  • Single Portable File Configuration #45401
  • Clear Communication regarding Servicing Releases #45426
  • Installing net9.0 SDK on AWS Linux 2023 breaks net8.0 SDK and runtime #45440
  • Failed to run the .NET10 App with error "You must install or update .NET to run this application..." #45469

PullRequests

Created

  • Make assembly version logic more robust Fixes #44042 #45518
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Enable signing in the VMR official pipeline #45517
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change Aspire RunSessionRequest definition #45515
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Microsoft.NET.Publish.targets GetCopyToPublishDirectoryItems depends on AssignProjectConfiguration #45512
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [VMR] Disable codeql on arm64 mac builds #45511
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [dotnet-watch] Make pipe reads and writes fully async #45495
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Added 🟣 to step names #45494
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [release/9.0.2xx] Expand MSBuildSdkResolver #45459
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use dotnet exec to run test app in CheckTargetFrameworkDisplayName #45332
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use variables for container values #45490
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Use a crossgen2 that runs on the host for R2Ring in a VMR build #45463
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Switch to spliting our test work items by method instead of class. #44898
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • File watcher improvements #45131
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Support package@version syntax for dotnet workload search/update/install version Fixes #42367 #45156
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Prepare GenAPI so it can be used for a new assembly diff generator #45389
    untriaged, Team:Runtime, Area-Tools
  • Enable package source mapping #45483
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #45427
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • [DO NOT MERGE} Skip a few tests on osx #45419
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2603592 #45465
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use managed Mach-O signer on non-Mac hosts #45019
    area-Host, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #45365
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 10.0.100-alpha.1.24612.1 #45435
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Do not automatically add nuget.org as a package source when it is absent from nuget.config Fixes #44312 #45410
    untriaged, Area-Templates
  • Copy dump file to the Helix upload location #45345
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Add VMR leg that builds test projects #44843
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Installer/finalizer in c# #44611
    Area-Infrastructure, 10.0.1xx
  • Fix missing test binlog #45480
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Read global.json to decide to run dotnet test in vstest or testing platform mode #45418
    Area-DotNet Test, config-system-candidate
  • Add integration tests for dotnet test scenarios #45138
    Area-DotNet Test
